mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Curtin, Andrew G.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Sept 15 1862. By Telegraph from Harrisburg 15 1862. We are busy assembling forces in Cumberland Valley to prevent invasion from the powerful army of the enemy now at Hagerstown & vicinity within five miles of the line have not a regiment that can be shared until the result of McClellan's movements against [page 2] the rebel army is decided Please keep me fully advised AG Curtin 53G125pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Curtin, Andrew G.
Harrisburg, Pennsylvania
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
